thread.title: Tree Houses for Grown-Ups

author: WSJ Real Estate
title: Tree Houses for Grown-Ups
text:
MANSION Tree Houses for Grown-Ups Having children can become an excuse to build a leafy retreat. Some stylish aeries come with skylights, TV and compostable toilets.
The Exotic—and Chaotic—Medina of Marrakesh Lures Home Buyers The old city in the heart of Marrakesh, Morocco, tempts overseas buyers with lavish, ornamented courtyard homes called riads.
Inside a Renovated Riad That’s Fit for a Sultan
